post.description: Create a new user. Admin only.

get.description: List users. Admin or Registration Staff only.

post.description:
Create a new patient user with patient profile.
Registration staff or Admin only.

Create a new doctor user with doctor profile.
Registration staff or Admin only.

Create a new staff user with staff profile.
Registration staff or Admin only.
Create a new clinic. Admin only.

get.description: List clinics. Any authenticated user.
Get a single clinic. Any authenticated user.
Get current user's profile. Any authenticated user.

post.description: Create a new visit. Admin or Registration Staff only.

get.description: List visits. Filtered by role.
Get a specific visit. Authorized by ownership.

patch.description: Update a visit. Admin or Doctor only.

delete.description: Delete a visit. Admin or Registration Staff only.

post.description: Create a medical record. Doctor only.

get.description: List medical records. Filtered by role.
Get a specific medical record. Authorized by ownership.

patch.description: Update a medical record. Doctor only.

delete.description: Delete a medical record. Admin or Doctor only.

post.description: Create a new medicine. Admin or Pharmacy Staff only.

get.description: List medicines. Any authenticated user.
Get a specific medicine. Any authenticated user.

patch.description: Update a medicine. Admin or Pharmacy Staff only.

delete.description: Delete a medicine. Admin or Pharmacy Staff only.

post.description: Create a new prescription. Doctor only.

get.description: List prescriptions. Filtered by role.
Get a specific prescription. Authorized by ownership.

patch.description: Update prescription status (dispense). Admin or Pharmacy Staff only.

post.description: Create a new lab test. Admin or Lab Staff only.

get.description: List all lab tests. Any authenticated user.
Get a specific lab test. Any authenticated user.

patch.description: Update a lab test. Admin or Lab Staff only.

delete.description: Delete a lab test. Admin or Lab Staff only.

post.description: Create a lab order. Doctor only.

get.description: List lab orders. Filtered by role (Doctor sees own, Staff sees all).
Get a specific lab order. Authorized by ownership.

patch.description: Update lab order status and optionally result.

post.description: Create a new referral. Doctor only.

get.description: List referrals. Filtered by role.
Get a specific referral. Authorized by ownership.

delete.description: Delete a referral. Admin or Doctor only.

post.description: Create a new invoice. Admin or Cashier Staff only.

get.description: List invoices. Filtered by role (Patient sees own, Staff sees all).
Get a specific invoice. Authorized by ownership.

patch.description: Update an invoice. Admin or Cashier Staff only.

delete.description: Delete an invoice. Admin or Cashier Staff only.

post.description: Register a wearable device. Patient only.

get.description: List wearable devices. Filtered by ownership.
Get a specific device. Authorized by ownership.

patch.description: Update a wearable device. Patient only.

delete.description: Delete a wearable device. Patient only.

post.description: Add a measurement from device. Patient only.

get.description: List measurements for a device. Authorized by ownership.
